LanguageData.Feenix.label: 피닉스
LanguageData.Feenix.description: Said to be fire incarnate, a single 피닉스 can lay waste to an entire colony. The leave a trail of flames wherever they go. Their hearts will continue to pulse with heat even after the creature has died.
LanguageData.GreenWyvern.label: 그린 와이번
LanguageData.GreenWyvern.description: A large, volatile draconic predator. Unlike true dragons, 와이번s are capable of flight using their modified arms rather than distinct wing appendages.
LanguageData.Kirin.label: 용기린
LanguageData.Kirin.description: Born of frost, Misterious 용기린 leave a trail of frost wherever they go. They are solitary creatures. Their fur and heart are highly prized on the rim worlds for their high insulation, and supposed medicinal usage.
LanguageData.Behir.label: 베히르
LanguageData.Behir.description: A 베히르 is a huge blue serpentine magical beast with a crocodilian head; the creature is around forty feet long and weighs around four thou모래 pounds. They can run quickly on their twelve short, powerful legs, or slither by folding their legs close to their body.
LanguageData.Barghest.label: 바르게스트
LanguageData.Barghest.description: A ghostly hound of lore, the sight of it is rumoured to foretell one's death.
